00052 SignalExtractor::SignalExtractor(const std::string &vectorsFileName, const std::string &dataFileName, const std::string &maskFileName, char displayMode)
00053 {
00054     m_directions = 0;
00055     m_refIm      = 0;
00056     m_sigmas     = 0;
00057 
00058     m_displayMode = displayMode;
00059 
00060     this->readFiles(vectorsFileName, dataFileName, maskFileName);
00061 }
00062 
00063 SignalExtractor::~SignalExtractor()
00064 {
00065     delete m_refIm;
00066 }
00067 
00068 void SignalExtractor::readFiles(const std::string &vectorsFileName, const std::string &dataFileName, const std::string &maskFileName)
00069 {
00070     assert(!vectorsFileName.empty());
00071     assert(!dataFileName.empty());
00072 
00073 
00074     Display1(m_displayMode, std::cout << "Reading data files..." << std::endl);
00075 
00076 
00077     //
00078     // Reading dwi sequence
00079     //
00080 
00081         Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "\tReading dwi sequence..." << std::flush);
00082 
00083         SequenceReader::Pointer reader = SequenceReader::New();
00084         reader->SetFileName(dataFileName);
00085         reader->Update();               // reading file
00086         m_data = reader->GetOutput();   // getting data
00087 
00088         Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "done." << std::endl);
00089 
00090 
00091     //
00092     // Reading image mask
00093     //
00094 
00095         Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "\tReading image mask..." << std::flush);
00096 
00097         MaskReader::Pointer mreader = MaskReader::New();
00098         mreader->SetFileName(maskFileName);
00099         mreader->Update();
00100         m_mask = mreader->GetOutput();
00101 
00102         Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "done." << std::endl);
00103 
00104 
00105     //
00106     // Reading vectors file
00107     //
00108 
00109         Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "\tReading vectors..." << std::flush);
00110 
00111         std::vector<Real> values;
00112 
00113         // Open file
00114         std::fstream vectorsFile(vectorsFileName.c_str(), std::fstream::in);
00115 
00116         if(!vectorsFile.is_open())  // Unable to open file
00117         {
00118             std::cout << "Error: unable to read gradient directions file !" << std::endl;
00119             exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00120         }
00121         else    // file opened
00122         {
00123             Real v = 0;
00124 
00125             while((vectorsFile >> v))
00126                 values.push_back(v);
00127 
00128             m_directions = new std::vector<Direction>;
00129             m_refIm   = new std::vector<unsigned int>;
00130             unsigned int nbVectors  = values.size()/3;
00131             unsigned int nbVectors2 = nbVectors + nbVectors;
00132 
00133             for(unsigned int i=0; i<nbVectors; i++)
00134             {
00135                 Vector tmp(values.at(i), values.at(i+nbVectors), values.at(i+nbVectors2));
00136 
00137                 if(tmp.isNull())
00138                     m_refIm->push_back(i);
00139                 else
00140                     m_directions->push_back(tmp.toDirection());
00141             }
00142         }
00143 
00144         // Close file
00145         vectorsFile.close();
00146 
00147         Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "done." << std::endl);
00148 
00149 
00150     Display1(m_displayMode, std::cout << "done." << std::endl);
00151 }
00152 
00153 void SignalExtractor::extract()
00154 {
00155     SequenceRegion dataRegion = m_data->GetLargestPossibleRegion();
00156 
00157     // Resample mask image
00158     MaskResampler::Pointer maskResampler = MaskResampler::New();
00159     maskResampler->SetInput(m_mask);
00160 
00161     MaskInterpolator::Pointer maskInterpolator = MaskInterpolator::New();
00162     maskResampler->SetInterpolator(maskInterpolator);
00163 
00164     Mask::SizeType msize;
00165     msize[0] = dataRegion.GetSize(0); msize[1] = dataRegion.GetSize(1); msize[2] = dataRegion.GetSize(2);
00166     maskResampler->SetSize(msize);
00167 
00168     itk::Matrix<Real,3,3> dirMat;
00169     itk::Matrix<Real,4,4> iniMat = m_data->GetDirection();
00170 
00171     dirMat(0,0) = iniMat(0,0);
00172     dirMat(0,1) = iniMat(0,1);
00173     dirMat(0,2) = iniMat(0,2);
00174 
00175     dirMat(1,0) = iniMat(1,0);
00176     dirMat(1,1) = iniMat(1,1);
00177     dirMat(1,2) = iniMat(1,2);
00178 
00179     dirMat(2,0) = iniMat(2,0);
00180     dirMat(2,1) = iniMat(2,1);
00181     dirMat(2,2) = iniMat(2,2);
00182 
00183     maskResampler->SetOutputDirection(dirMat);
00184 
00185     Mask::PointType morigin;
00186     morigin[0] = m_data->GetOrigin()[0]; morigin[1] = m_data->GetOrigin()[1]; morigin[2] = m_data->GetOrigin()[2];
00187     maskResampler->SetOutputOrigin(morigin);
00188 
00189     Mask::SpacingType mspacing;
00190     mspacing[0] = m_data->GetSpacing()[0]; mspacing[1] = m_data->GetSpacing()[1]; mspacing[2] = m_data->GetSpacing()[2];
00191     maskResampler->SetOutputSpacing(mspacing);
00192 
00193     maskResampler->Update();
00194     m_mask = maskResampler->GetOutput();
00195 
00196 
00197     MaskRegion maskRegion     = m_mask->GetLargestPossibleRegion();
00198 
00199     unsigned int nbOfImages = m_directions->size() + m_refIm->size();
00200 
00201 
00202     Display1(m_displayMode, std::cout << "Preparing data..." << std::endl);
00203 
00204     //
00205     // Verify sizes
00206     //
00207 
00208         Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "\tVerifying data..." << std::endl);
00209 
00210         if(dataRegion.GetSize(3) != nbOfImages)
00211         {
00212             std::cerr << "Error: bad data !" << std::endl;
00213             std::cerr << "There are " << dataRegion.GetSize(3) << " MRI images and ";
00214             std::cerr << nbOfImages << " vectors." << std::endl;
00215             exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00216         }
00217 
00218         if(dataRegion.GetSize(0) != maskRegion.GetSize(0) &&
00219            dataRegion.GetSize(1) != maskRegion.GetSize(1) &&
00220            dataRegion.GetSize(2) != maskRegion.GetSize(2))
00221         {
00222             std::cerr << "Error: bad data !" << std::endl;
00223             std::cerr << "Data image is of size ";
00224             std::cerr << dataRegion.GetSize(0) << "x" << dataRegion.GetSize(1) << "x" << dataRegion.GetSize(2);
00225             std::cerr << " and image mask is of size ";
00226             std::cerr << maskRegion.GetSize(0) << "x" << maskRegion.GetSize(1) << "x" << maskRegion.GetSize(2);
00227             std::cerr << "!" << std::endl;
00228             exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00229         }
00230 
00231         Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "\t\tThere are " << m_refIm->size() << " reference images and ");
00232         Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << m_directions->size() << " gradient images of size ");
00233         Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << dataRegion.GetSize(0) << "x" << dataRegion.GetSize(1) << "x" << dataRegion.GetSize(2) << "." << std::endl);
00234 
00235         Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "\tdone." << std::endl);
00236 
00237 
00238     //
00239     // Compute B0 reference image
00240     //
00241 
00242         Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "\tCompute reference image..." << std::flush);
00243 
00244         // Preparating mask iterator
00245         MaskIterator maskIt(m_mask, maskRegion);
00246 
00247         // Allocate space memory for B0 reference image
00248         Image::Pointer B0 = Image::New();
00249 
00250         Image::SizeType B0Size;
00251         B0Size[0] = dataRegion.GetSize(0); B0Size[1] = dataRegion.GetSize(1); B0Size[2] = dataRegion.GetSize(2);
00252         B0->SetRegions(B0Size);
00253 
00254         Image::SpacingType b0spacing;
00255         b0spacing[0] = m_data->GetSpacing()[0];
00256         b0spacing[1] = m_data->GetSpacing()[1];
00257         b0spacing[2] = m_data->GetSpacing()[2];
00258         B0->SetSpacing(b0spacing);
00259 
00260         Image::PointType b0origin;
00261         b0origin[0] = m_data->GetOrigin()[0];
00262         b0origin[1] = m_data->GetOrigin()[1];
00263         b0origin[2] = m_data->GetOrigin()[2];
00264         B0->SetOrigin(b0origin);
00265 
00266         B0->SetDirection(dirMat);
00267 
00268         B0->Allocate();
00269         B0->FillBuffer(0);
00270 
00271         // Create B0 reference image
00272         ImageRegion B0Region = B0->GetLargestPossibleRegion();
00273         ImageIterator B0It(B0, B0Region);
00274 
00275         Sequence::IndexType sIndex;
00276         Sequence::SizeType sSize;
00277 
00278         std::vector<unsigned int>::iterator refImIt;
00279 
00280         for(refImIt = m_refIm->begin(); refImIt != m_refIm->end(); refImIt++)
00281         {
00282             // Set correct region in sequence
00283             sIndex[0] = 0; sIndex[1] = 0; sIndex[2] = 0;
00284             sIndex[3] = (*refImIt);
00285             dataRegion.SetIndex(sIndex);
00286 
00287             sSize[0] = B0Size[0]; sSize[1] = B0Size[1]; sSize[2] = B0Size[2];
00288             sSize[3] = 1;
00289             dataRegion.SetSize(sSize);
00290 
00291             SequenceIterator dataIt(m_data, dataRegion);
00292 
00293             // Fill B0 reference image (moy of all reference images)
00294             for(B0It.GoToBegin(), maskIt.GoToBegin(), dataIt.GoToBegin(); !B0It.IsAtEnd() && !maskIt.IsAtEnd() && !dataIt.IsAtEnd(); ++B0It, ++maskIt, ++dataIt)
00295             {
00296                 if(maskIt.Get() == 1)
00297                     B0It.Set(B0It.Get() + dataIt.Get()/m_refIm->size());
00298             }
00299         } // for refImIt
00300 
00301 /*
00302         // Write B0 image
00303         ImageWriter::Pointer writer = ImageWriter::New();
00304 
00305         writer->SetFileName("B0.nii.gz");
00306         writer->SetInput(B0);
00307 
00308         try
00309         {
00310             writer->Update();
00311         }
00312         catch(itk::ImageFileWriterException &err)
00313         {
00314             std::cout << "Error: " << std::endl;
00315             std::cout << err << std::endl;
00316         }
00317 //*/
00318         Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "done." << std::endl);
00319 
00320 
00321     //
00322     // Compute signal
00323     //
00324 
00325         Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "\tCompute signal..." << std::flush);
00326 
00327         // Allocation of space memory for signal images
00328         m_signal = Sequence::New();
00329 
00330         Sequence::SizeType signalSize;
00331         signalSize[0] = dataRegion.GetSize(0); signalSize[1] = dataRegion.GetSize(1);
00332         signalSize[2] = dataRegion.GetSize(2); signalSize[3] = m_directions->size();
00333         m_signal->SetRegions(signalSize);
00334 
00335         Sequence::SpacingType spacing = m_data->GetSpacing();
00336         m_signal->SetSpacing(spacing);
00337 
00338         Sequence::PointType origin = m_data->GetOrigin();
00339         m_signal->SetOrigin(origin);
00340 
00341         m_signal->SetDirection(m_data->GetDirection());
00342 
00343         m_signal->Allocate();
00344         m_signal->FillBuffer(0);
00345 
00346 
00347         // Normalize signal
00348         unsigned int count = 0;
00349         SequenceRegion signalRegion;
00350 
00351         for(unsigned int n = 0; n<nbOfImages; n++)
00352         {
00353             if(*find(m_refIm->begin(), m_refIm->end()-1, n) != n) // the nth image is not a reference image
00354             {
00355                 // Define region for data sequence
00356                 sIndex[0] = 0; sIndex[1] = 0; sIndex[2] = 0;
00357                 sIndex[3] = n;
00358                 dataRegion.SetIndex(sIndex);
00359 
00360                 sSize[0] = B0Size[0]; sSize[1] = B0Size[1]; sSize[2] = B0Size[2];
00361                 sSize[3] = 1;
00362                 dataRegion.SetSize(sSize);
00363 
00364                 SequenceIterator dataIt(m_data, dataRegion);
00365 
00366                 // Define region for signal sequence
00367                 sIndex[0] = 0; sIndex[1] = 0; sIndex[2] = 0;
00368                 sIndex[3] = n - count;
00369                 signalRegion.SetIndex(sIndex);
00370 
00371                 sSize[0] = B0Size[0]; sSize[1] = B0Size[1]; sSize[2] = B0Size[2];
00372                 sSize[3] = 1;
00373                 signalRegion.SetSize(sSize);
00374 
00375                 SequenceIterator signalIt(m_signal, signalRegion);
00376 
00377                 // Fill current image (normalization : divide signal by reference image)
00378                 for(B0It.GoToBegin(), dataIt.GoToBegin(), signalIt.GoToBegin(), maskIt.GoToBegin();
00379                         !B0It.IsAtEnd() && !dataIt.IsAtEnd() && !signalIt.IsAtEnd() && !maskIt.IsAtEnd();
00380                             ++B0It, ++dataIt, ++signalIt, ++maskIt)
00381                 {
00382                     if(maskIt.Get() == 1)    // is in mask
00383                         signalIt.Set((B0It.Get() != 0. ? dataIt.Get() / B0It.Get() : 0.));
00384                 }
00385             }
00386             else // the nth image is a reference image
00387             {
00388                 count++;
00389             }
00390         } // for n
00391 
00392         Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "done." << std::endl);
00393 
00394 
00395     //
00396     // Compute standard deviation (sigma)
00397     //
00398 
00399         Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "\tCompute standard deviation of signal images..." << std::flush);
00400 
00401         this->computeSigmas();
00402 
00403         Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "done." << std::endl);
00404 
00405     Display1(m_displayMode, std::cout << "done." << std::endl);
00406 }
00407 
00408 void SignalExtractor::save()
00409 {
00410     assert(m_directions);
00411     assert(m_sigmas);
00412 
00413 
00414     Display1(m_displayMode, std::cout << "Saving data..." << std::endl);
00415 
00416     //
00417     // Saving signal
00418     //
00419 
00420         Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "\tsignal into file \"signal.nii.gz\"..." << std::flush);
00421 
00422         SequenceWriter::Pointer writer = SequenceWriter::New();
00423 
00424         writer->SetFileName("signal.nii.gz");
00425         writer->SetInput(m_signal);
00426 
00427         try
00428         {
00429             writer->Update();
00430             Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "done." << std::endl);
00431         }
00432         catch(itk::ImageFileWriterException &err)
00433         {
00434             std::cout << "Error: " << std::endl;
00435             std::cout << err << std::endl;
00436         }
00437 
00438 
00439     //
00440     // Saving directions
00441     //
00442 
00443         Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "\tvectors into file \"directions.txt\"..." << std::flush);
00444 
00445         std::fstream directionsFile("directions.txt", std::fstream::out);
00446 
00447         if(!directionsFile.is_open()) // Unable to open file
00448         {
00449             std::cerr << "Error: unable to write in file !" << std::endl;
00450             exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00451         }
00452         else                       // File is open
00453         {
00454             for(std::vector<Direction>::iterator it = m_directions->begin(); it != m_directions->end(); it++)
00455                 directionsFile << (*it).theta() << " " << (*it).phi() << " ";
00456         }
00457 
00458         directionsFile.close();
00459 
00460         std::cout << "done." << std::endl;
00461 
00462 
00463     //
00464     // Saving standard deviation
00465     //
00466 
00467         Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "\tstandard deviations into file \"sigmas.txt\"..." << std::flush);
00468 
00469         std::fstream sigmasFile("sigmas.txt", std::fstream::out);
00470 
00471         if(!sigmasFile.is_open()) // Unable to open file
00472         {
00473             std::cerr << "Error: unable to write in file !" << std::endl;
00474             exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00475         }
00476         else                       // File is open
00477         {
00478             std::vector<Direction>::iterator dIt;
00479 
00480             for(std::vector<Real>::iterator it = m_sigmas->begin(); it != m_sigmas->end(); it++)
00481                 sigmasFile << (*it) << " ";
00482         }
00483 
00484         sigmasFile.close();
00485 
00486         Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "done." << std::endl);
00487 
00488     Display1(m_displayMode, std::cout << "done." << std::endl);
00489 }

00510 
00511 void SignalExtractor::computeSigmas()
00512 {
00513     // An Optimized Blockwise Non Local Means
00514     // Denoising Filter for 3D Magnetic Resonance
00515     // Images by Coupé et al.
00516 
00517 
00518     assert(m_signal);
00519     assert(!m_sigmas);
00520 
00521 
00522     m_sigmas = new std::vector<Real>;
00523 
00524 
00525     Real _sqrt6on7 = std::sqrt(6./7.);
00526     Real _1on6     = 1./6.;
00527 
00528     unsigned int xMax = m_signal->GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize(0);
00529     unsigned int yMax = m_signal->GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize(1);
00530     unsigned int zMax = m_signal->GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize(2);
00531     unsigned int kMax = m_signal->GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize(3);
00532 
00533 
00534     // Define loop region
00535     SequenceRegion loopRegion;
00536 
00537     Sequence::SizeType loopSize;
00538     loopSize[0] = xMax; loopSize[1] = yMax;
00539     loopSize[2] = zMax; loopSize[3] = 1;
00540     loopRegion.SetSize(loopSize);
00541 
00542 
00543     //
00544     // Compute coefficients
00545     //
00546 
00547         // Allocate space memory for coefficients image
00548         Sequence::Pointer coeffs = Sequence::New();
00549         coeffs->SetRegions(m_signal->GetLargestPossibleRegion());
00550         coeffs->Allocate();
00551         coeffs->FillBuffer(0);
00552 
00553         // Define mask iterator
00554         MaskIterator maskIt(m_mask, m_mask->GetLargestPossibleRegion());
00555 
00556         // Volume dimensions for each gradient image
00557         std::vector<Real> volumeSize;
00558 
00559         // For each image
00560         for(unsigned int k=0; k<kMax; k++)
00561         {
00562             // Initialize the number of voxels in volume
00563             volumeSize.push_back(0);
00564 
00565             // Set the correct index
00566             Sequence::IndexType loopIndex;
00567             loopIndex[0] = 0; loopIndex[1] = 0;
00568             loopIndex[2] = 0; loopIndex[3] = k;
00569             loopRegion.SetIndex(loopIndex);
00570 
00571             // Define signal iterator
00572             SequenceNeighborhoodIterator::RadiusType radius;
00573             radius[0] = 1; radius[1] = 1; radius[2] = 1; radius[3] = 0;
00574 
00575             SequenceNeighborhoodIterator signalIt(radius, m_signal, loopRegion);
00576 
00577             SequenceNeighborhoodIterator::OffsetType offset1 = { {-1, 0, 0, 0} };
00578             SequenceNeighborhoodIterator::OffsetType offset2 = { { 1, 0, 0, 0} };
00579             SequenceNeighborhoodIterator::OffsetType offset3 = { { 0,-1, 0, 0} };
00580             SequenceNeighborhoodIterator::OffsetType offset4 = { { 0, 1, 0, 0} };
00581             SequenceNeighborhoodIterator::OffsetType offset5 = { { 0, 0,-1, 0} };
00582             SequenceNeighborhoodIterator::OffsetType offset6 = { { 0, 0, 1, 0} };
00583 
00584             // Define coefficients images iterator
00585             SequenceIterator coeffsIt(coeffs, loopRegion);
00586 
00587             // Compute coefficients for each positions in current image
00588             for(signalIt.GoToBegin(), coeffsIt.GoToBegin(), maskIt.GoToBegin(); !signalIt.IsAtEnd() && !coeffsIt.IsAtEnd() && !maskIt.IsAtEnd(); ++signalIt, ++coeffsIt, ++maskIt)
00589             {
00590                 if(maskIt.Get() == 1)
00591                 {
00592                     Real sum = signalIt.GetPixel(offset1);
00593                     sum     += signalIt.GetPixel(offset2);
00594                     sum     += signalIt.GetPixel(offset3);
00595                     sum     += signalIt.GetPixel(offset4);
00596                     sum     += signalIt.GetPixel(offset5);
00597                     sum     += signalIt.GetPixel(offset6);
00598 
00599                     coeffsIt.Set(_sqrt6on7 * (signalIt.GetCenterPixel() - _1on6*sum));
00600 
00601                     volumeSize[k]++;
00602                 }
00603             } // for signalIt && coeffsIt
00604         } // for k
00605 
00606 
00607     //
00608     // Compute sigmas
00609     //
00610 
00611         // For each image
00612         for(unsigned int k=0; k<kMax; k++)
00613         {
00614             // Set the correct index
00615             Sequence::IndexType loopIndex;
00616             loopIndex[0] = 0; loopIndex[1] = 0;
00617             loopIndex[2] = 0; loopIndex[3] = k;
00618             loopRegion.SetIndex(loopIndex);
00619 
00620             // Define coefficients images iterator
00621             SequenceIterator coeffsIt(coeffs, loopRegion);
00622 
00623             Real sum = 0;
00624 
00625             // Compute standard deviation (sigma)
00626             for(coeffsIt.GoToBegin(), maskIt.GoToBegin(); !coeffsIt.IsAtEnd() && !maskIt.IsAtEnd(); ++coeffsIt, ++maskIt)
00627             {
00628                 if(maskIt.Get() == 1)
00629                     sum += coeffsIt.Get() * coeffsIt.Get();
00630             }
00631 
00632             m_sigmas->push_back(std::sqrt((1.0/volumeSize[k]) * sum));
00633         } // for k
00634 }
00635 
00636 } // namespace btk
00637
